author: Beth P
title: How Smart Solar Inverters Improve Energy Efficiency for Homes and Businesses
text:
Energy efficiency is becoming increasingly important in Australia as the country strives to reduce its reliance on fossil fuels and mitigate the impacts of climate change. Solar energy is a clean and renewable source of electricity that can help improve energy efficiency in both homes and businesses. However, a high-quality solar inverter is essential to maximise the benefits of solar energy.
Are you looking to save money on your electricity bills and reduce your carbon footprint? Solar energy is the perfect solution! Energy Matters can help you get up to 3 FREE solar quotes from pre-qualified and vetted solar installers in your area.
Energy Matters is the leading supplier of solar quotes in Australia due to its vast partnership network of high-quality installers. With Energy Matters, you can be sure you’re getting the best possible deal on solar energy.
Get up to 3 FREE Solar Quotes from our Pre-Vetted Solar Installers Today! Traditional vs. Smart solar inverters A solar inverter is a crucial component of any solar energy system. It converts the direct current (DC) electricity produced by solar panels into alternating (AC) electricity used in homes and businesses.
Traditional solar inverters Traditional solar inverters are relatively simple devices that have been used for many years. They are typically designed to operate at a fixed frequency and voltage, which means they may only be able to operate at their maximum efficiency under certain conditions.
What are smart solar inverters? Smart solar inverters, a more advanced type of inverter designed to improve solar energy systems’ efficiency, are a key component of energy-efficient solar systems.
They have various features to optimise the system’s performance under different conditions. A new generation of inverters offers advanced features to improve energy efficiency and system performance.
Key features of smart solar inverters Some of the key features of smart solar inverters include:
Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT): MPPT technology ensures that the inverter extracts the maximum power from the solar panels, regardless of changing weather conditions. Reactive power control: Smart inverters can control reactive power, improving the grid’s overall power quality. Self-diagnostics and monitoring: Smart inverters are equipped with self-diagnostic features that can help to identify and troubleshoot problems. They also monitor real-time system performance, allowing users to track energy production and consumption. Remote monitoring and control: Many smart inverters can be monitored and controlled remotely using a smartphone or computer. This allows users to optimise system performance and troubleshoot problems from anywhere worldwide. Grid synchronisation: Smart inverters can seamlessly synchronise with the grid, ensuring that the solar system operates harmoniously with the broader electricity network. Energy storage integration: Some smart inverters are compatible with solar battery storage systems , allowing users to store excess solar energy during high demand or grid outages. Use Energy Matters’ easy-to-use solar power and battery storage calculator to determine the size of your solar system with storage! Our solar calculator will generate performance information and potential savings.
We can send this information to 3 of our pre-vetted and trusted local installers in your area to receive obligation-free solar quotes .
How do smart solar inverters improve energy efficiency? Smart solar inverters can improve energy efficiency in several ways. One is by maximising the amount of energy produced by the solar panels. Smart inverters can do this by constantly monitoring the panels’ output and adjusting the inverter’s settings accordingly. This ensures that the inverter is always operating at its maximum efficiency.
Another way smart solar inverters can improve energy efficiency is by reducing energy losses. Traditional inverters can lose a significant amount of energy due to design inefficiencies. Smart inverters, on the other hand, are designed to be much more efficient. This means that they can reduce energy losses by up to 20%.
Benefits of smart solar inverters for homes and businesses The benefits of using smart solar inverters include:
Benefits for homes Enhanced energy efficiency: Smart inverters optimise power output, ensuring maximum energy generation from solar panels. Remote monitoring and control: Many smart inverters offer mobile apps or web portals for real-time monitoring, allowing homeowners to track energy production, consumption, and system performance. Grid Integration and backup power: Some smart inverters support grid-tied or off-grid configurations, enabling homeowners to sell excess energy back to the grid or use solar power as a backup during outages. Advanced safety features: Smart inverters often include built-in safety features like rapid shutdown, arc fault protection, and overcurrent protection to safeguard the system and occupants. Solar for businesses: The role of smart solar inverters Australia’s businesses increasingly turn to solar energy to reduce costs and improve environmental sustainability. Smart solar inverters are vital in helping businesses maximise solar energy’s benefits. Smart inverters can help businesses achieve energy efficiency goals and reduce operating costs by optimising system performance and providing advanced monitoring and control features.
Benefits for businesses Reduced operational costs: Businesses can significantly lower their electricity bills by generating solar power, increasing profitability. Improved energy independence: Businesses can become less reliant on the grid, reducing their vulnerability to power outages and fluctuations in energy prices. Enhanced sustainability: Solar power systems with smart inverters contribute to a more sustainable future by reducing greenhouse gas emissions and promoting renewable energy. Tax incentives and rebates: Many governments offer incentives, such as tax credits or rebates, to encourage businesses to adopt solar power systems. Finding the right solar incentives
Your location, system size, and property type will determine the specific incentives you qualify for. Check our pages for the most up-to-date information and applicable rebates.
Home Solar Rebates, Incentives & Subsidies In Australia Commercial Solar Rebates, Grants & Incentives Solar Battery System Rebates, Subsidies, & Incentives Off Grid Solar Power Rebates For Remote Installations Choosing the right smart solar inverter When selecting a smart solar inverter for your home or business, it is important to consider some factors, including:
System size: The inverter must be sized to match the capacity of your solar panels. Compatibility: The inverter must be compatible with your other solar system components, such as the solar panels and battery storage system (if applicable). Features: Consider the specific features that are important to you, such as MPPT technology, reactive power control, and remote monitoring capabilities. Efficiency: To get the most out of your solar energy system, look for an inverter with a high-efficiency rating. Warranty: A long warranty period can provide peace of mind and protection against unexpected problems. Smart solar inverters are valuable for improving energy efficiency in Australia’s homes and businesses. Maximising power output, optimising system performance, and providing advanced monitoring and control features can help reduce electricity costs, increase system reliability, and enhance grid stability.
As Australia transitions towards a clean energy future, smart solar inverters will become increasingly important in helping the country achieve its energy efficiency and sustainability goals. Check our page for our recommended solar products .
Embrace the energy efficiency revolution by upgrading your solar systems and adding a battery or solar inverters with Energy Matters . Energy Matters helps Australian home and business owners receive personalised solar quotes through our large network of high-quality solar installers.
With our 3 free solar quotes, you can compare plans from pre-qualified and vetted installers in your area and find the perfect solution for your home and business.

author: Shahid Meighan
title: Why cats are Islam's most highly regarded pet
text: Cats and Islam: Why felines are the faith's 'most highly regarded pet' [Shahid Meighan](https://www.dispatch.com/staff/71216819007/shahid-meighan/) Certain animals have long been considered companions for humankind. Whether for comfort and partnership or for more practical purposes like pest control and guarding people and livestock, humans have always had a relationship with animals of some sort. While Americans tend to place dogs at the top of the pet pyramid, cats, both in the past and now, hold a special and coveted space in other cultures. In ancient Egypt, for example, cats were viewed as integral parts of the culture and they were even thought to carry an important role in the afterlife, which explains why they were discovered in tombs alongside humans. Cats also served a practical purpose by chasing away pests like mice and scorpions. Cats are also depicted in [Middle Eastern and ancient Egyptian artwork dating back centuries,](https://www.arabamerica.com/cats-in-islam-and-the-arab-world/) and immortalized in miniature sculptures, incense holders, and other trinkets and art pieces. Some sculptures and statues even had cat-like heads, with deities sharing this same description. In Islam, these feline friends are afforded special privileges compared to other pets, like dogs and cattle, says Imran Malik, a practicing Muslim and interfaith coordinator of the [Noor Islamic Cultural Center](https://www.noorohio.org/)'s main campus. "Cats have a very special place in the Muslim household and in the Muslim culture in general," Malik told the Dispatch. According to Malik, this reverence and adoration for cats stems from them being viewed as clean, pure, and hygienic. In fact, in mosques throughout the world, [cats can be seen roaming the halls](https://www.middleeasteye.net/features/catstanbul-not-constantinople-welcome-feline-capital-world), are considered an integral part of the Islamic community and are granted leeway and access in these spiritual dwellings compared to other pets. Cats are even allowed to rest on Muslims' [prayer rugs- which are required to be clean and hygienic at all times.](https://www.learnreligions.com/how-prayer-rugs-are-used-2004512) Prophet Muhammad and "The Father of Kittens" The adoration of cats in Islam can be traced to the faith's Hadith (literally meaning 'statement'), a collection of wisdom and phrases from Prophet Muhammad. The story goes that the Prophet himself was fond of cats and owned several. [There is even a well-known tale](https://www.arabamerica.com/cats-in-islam-and-the-arab-world/) about how the Prophet woke up one morning for the call to prayers when he noticed that his own cat, Muezza, fell asleep on the sleeve of his robe. Most people would have woken their cat if it fell asleep on any of their clothes. Instead, as the story goes, Prophet Muhammad chose to cut off a piece of the sleeve of his robe and attend the prayer session, so he didn't disturb Muezza's sleep. In a separate hadith, [it is said that Prophet Muhammad had a traveling companion named Abu Hurayrah,](https://www.the-wayfarer.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=222%3Athe-sunnah-and-blessings-in-healing-effects-of-cats&catid=8%3Aarticles&Itemid=8&limitstart=2) a nickname that translates to "father of cats." Prophet Muhammad gave him this nickname because Abu Hurayrah always carried a small cat with him in a bag. As the story goes, this same cat also saved Muhammad's life from a snake. While the authenticity of these tales is debated by Islamic scholars, they serve to highlight the fondness, respect and reverence that Islam shows towards cats, and the greater message that all Muslims are required treat all living things with empathy, compassion, and kindness. "It is heavily subscribed that [you should] take care of your animals and that you should not be mean to them, you should not be aggressive to them, and you should be very humane and polite in in your relationship to your animals as well," says Malik. So, are Muslims not allowed to own dogs? While owning dogs is not strictly forbidden in the faith, it is generally frowned upon, says Malik. However, if dogs are being used in service such as guide dogs, to herd livestock, or for protection, it is permissible, as long as efforts are made to maintain the hygiene of the home. "Cats are considered to be a lot more hygienic compared to dogs," says Malik. While it is usually recommended that dogs be kept outside of the home, Malik also acknowledges that this may not be practical or humane, depending on the environment or weather conditions. "You know, you don't want to put your pet outside in an environment which can be either too cold or too hot for them to bear," says Malik. "If you can manage them [dogs], then I think you're okay, because at the end of the day it's just a life that you're caring for."@ShahidMeighan smeighan@dispatch.com

author: Redacción El Heraldo Digital
title: Ismael Burgueño dialoga con representantes del sector de la construcción y la vivienda de Tijuana | El Heraldo de México
text: El candidato de Morena, PT y PVEM a la alcaldía de Tijuana, Baja California, Ismael Burgueño, se reunió con representantes del sector de la construcción y la vivienda en el municipio. Ante ellos, expresó su compromiso de continuar impulsando el crecimiento de Tijuana, el cual remarcó que se realizará de un modo responsable y ordenado. Así lo dio a conocer el candidato morenista luego de su reunión con este sector económico, quienes fueron representados por la Cámara Mexicana de la Industria de la Construcción (CMIC) delegación Tijuana, así como con la Camara Nacional de la Industria de Desarrollo y Promoción de Vivienda (Canadevi). "Esta mañana nos reunimos con socios de @cmic_tijuana y @canadevibajacalifornia , donde reafirmamos nuestro compromiso de que siempre apoyaremos proyectos que impulsen el crecimiento responsable y ordenado de Tijuana", informó el candidato a través de sus redes sociales. Sigue leyendo: [Julian Leyzaola, exsecretario de Seguridad de Tijuana, se integra a equipo del candidato Ismael Burgueño](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/elecciones/2024/4/22/julian-leyzaola-exsecretario-de-seguridad-de-tijuana-se-integra-equipo-del-candidato-ismael-burgueno-596365.html) [Rescatan a 36 migrantes de diversas nacionalidades en Tijuana](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/4/25/rescatan-36-migrantes-de-diversas-nacionalidades-en-tijuana-597427.html) ¿Cuáles fueron los temas que dialogaron? Por su parte, la CMIC también destacó el encuentro y diálogo que sostuvieron con el aspirante morenista a la presidencia municipal y revelaron que los temas que se trataron fueron desde la seguridad, movilidad, inversión y empleo, pues todos ellos están enfocados al crecimiento económico. "Hablando de temas de seguridad, movilidad, inversión y empleo, temas enfocados al sector de la construcción, donde empresas agremiadas a la Cámara Mexicana de la Industria de la Construcción en Tijuana y a la Cámara Nacional del Desarrollo de la Vivienda en Baja California, expusieron sus inquietudes y sugerencias referente al desarrollo e impulso a este importante sector económico", detalló CMIC.

author: News 12 Staff
title: STORM WATCH: Coastal storm expected to bring heavy downpours Saturday
text: Headlines: NOW: Storm Team Meteorologist Michele Powers says it's quiet and dry, but a coastal storm is on the way. FORECAST: The costal storm will merge with a front to our west, increasing the chance of heavy rain up and down the I-95 corridor. The rain will start early tomorrow morning between 2 a.m. and 3 a.m. At the onset, there will be some sleet and freezing rain for northern Litchfield County. A winter weather advisory is in effect for parts of Connecticut. Higher elevations could have slick conditions and sheltered colder valleys. Mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 inch and ice accumulations of around 1/10 of an inch. Steady rain will fall by mid to late morning and through the day. Heavier downpours are likely between 4 p.m.- 7 p.m. This is when street flooding is more likely. The rain will wrap up during the evening and by 9 p.m. Runoff will continue into the rivers, streams and creeks. Minor flooding on the Housatonic River by Sunday. Coastal flooding is low at this time. Better chance of that happening early next week with the full moon. Winds will be gusty and closer to the shoreline we'll see 30-35 mph gusts. Windy into and through Sunday. FLOOD WATCH: There is a flood watch for the entire area from 7 a.m. Saturday until 2 a.m. Sunday. 2-3.5" of rain will fall and create some street/urban flooding. Eventually minor flooding on some rivers. SATURDAY: Rain and wind with the storm offshore. Warmer. High of 52 (STORM WATCH) SUNDAY: Gradual clearing and breezy. High of 47. MONDAY: Mostly sunny. High of 50. TUESDAY: Partly sunny. High of 50. WEDNESDAY: Mostly cloudy with showers. High of 52. THURSDAY: Mostly cloudy with showers. High of 55. FRIDAY: Partly sunny. High of 59.

author: Gold Coast Bulletin
title: Ground News - ‘An Absolutely Beautiful Night:’ Maryland Gets Showered in Snow
text: ‘An Absolutely Beautiful Night:’ Maryland Gets Showered in Snow [winter storm](https://ground.news/interest/winter-storm)hit the Baltimore-Washington area, bringing snow on Monday, January 15. The National Weather Service said the “total snow accumulations will reach four to six inches.” Footage shared by X user @keatondesue shows the ongoing snowfall in the city of Bethesda, near Washington, citing an “absolutely beautiful night.” The winter storm warning remains in effect until Tuesday morning. author: @dainikbhaskar
title: बस स्टैंड सूने रहे, यात्री हुए परेशान
text:
Hindi NewsLocalRajasthanSawai madhopur- Bus Stands Remained Empty, Passengers Were Troubled
बस स्टैंड सूने रहे, यात्री हुए परेशान
- कॉपी लिंक
अक्षय तृतीया पर बुधवार को गंगापुर और आसपास के इलाके में बंपर शादियां हुई। शादियों को लेकर मेरिज होम, हलवाई, डीजे, डेकोरेशन, केटरिंग और शादियों से जुड़े अन्य कामों के लोग व्यस्त नजर आए। शहर के करीब तीन दर्जन मेरिज होम पूरी तरह बुक रहे।
अक्षय तृतीया पर ज्यादातर प्राइवेट बसें और करीब एक दर्जन रोडवेज की बसें शादियांे में बुक हो जाने के कारण रोडवेज और प्राइवेट बस स्टैंड पर सन्नाटा पसरा रहा। बाहर जाने के लिए यात्री परेशान होते रहे। कई यात्रियों को बस नहीं मिलने पर उन्हें डग्गेमार वाहनों का सहारा लेना पड़ा।
यात्रियों ने बताया कि रोडवेज बस स्टैण्ड और निजी बस स्टैड पर एक भी बस नजर नहीं आई। वहीं हिण्डौन आगार के जगजीत सिंह ने बताया कि अक्षय तृतीया होने की वजह से एक दर्जन बसें शादी के लिए बुक की गई। शेष बसों को अपने-अपने मार्गों पर संचालित किया गया। कुछ चालक व परिचालक अक्षय तृतीया के होने पर छुट्टी लेकर चल गए।
पूरी खबर पढ़ें ऐप परप्रीमियम मेंबरशिप है तो
लॉगिन करें
